item.title: AI Video Maker needed to build an instagram chanel and for coaching me. - Upwork
item.description:
I want to build an isntagram chanel. I am an author wirting on health an nutrition. But the best prompts produce compelety unusable result. Even thought I have eaxact chat GBT script and pics that I want. I tried Lumen 5, Invideo, Invideo AI all a nightmare in the produce results. I want to create something like this:
https://www.instagram.com/gesundheitsfakten/

With my brand logo, fonts and descend stock material that AI finds.
I need somebody to consult me on a platform that can do this, set up the initial video and helps me doing it 1:1 till I am able to do it.
1. I want to upload my own voice. No avatar or avatar speaking
2. pics must fit the text which is in German.
3. this is the prompt I gave in the word DOK.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$22.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:09 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Video Editing

item.title: Voice Actor for Enthusiastic Characters - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Voice Actor for or YouTube channel. As a Voice Actor, you will be responsible for providing high-quality voice-over recordings for our channel.. Your ability to read the script and use the right tone/emotions based on the words is important.

  Responsibilities:
  - Provide voice-over recordings DAILY
  - Embracace accurate tone of voice
  - Follow direction and adapt to feedback from the creative team
  - Meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality recordings

  Skills:
  - Exceptional vocal range and versatility
  - Excellent vocal projection and enunciation
  - Proficiency in audio editing software


$15 per video (around 1000-1500 words), multiple videos a week.

  This is project will last a long time if youre the right candidate. This is a long term position for our lead voice actor on an established YouTube channel.  We are seeking an intermediate voice actor with previous experience in voice-over work. If you are passionate about voice acting and can bring enthusiasm to every video, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:09 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Female, Young Adult, Male, Voice Acting, US English Dialect
Skills: Female, Young Adult, Male, Voice Acting, US English Dialect
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video clip finder - EASY money - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to source video clips for our new twitter page.

The ideal candidate will have the expertise to source and find for high-quality video clips on the internet that aligns with our twitter theme page.

We are NOT Looking for a "Shorts Video Editor". - We are looking for a expert video clip finder.

Video clips required, such as:
- bad drivers
- road rage.
- Convenient cops

No Editing required. Just find and send.

$30 for 100-200 video clips.

The topic of video you will be finding will be given to you. (Road rage, public freakouts, etc..).

Please provide video examples of what videos you can find.

Please write code name: VID at the start of your proposal.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Creators For our Running Shoes Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for 3-5 UGC creators for our running shoes brand to create raw footages (no editing).

Our mission is not just to sell the products, but to create a community of runners and bring the best experience using our products in a long run.

Requirements:
- You allow us to use all your videos in our campaigns
- You already have experience making UGC videos within shoes niche
- You can do many videos with a discount
- Willing to make videos according to reference
- You have a passion and can emotionally resonate  with the community of runners / athletes, so they can not only watch the videos but make a purchase
- Willing to improve skills in video creation / open to feedback
- Being honest/genuine, otherwise it won' work

We don't need perfected videos with perfect lighting or anything, we just need videos that are worth watching. Also, we prefer videos from 10 to 30 seconds long. Social platforms we want to put videos on: Tiktok & Instagram

Rate/price: Offer what you are willing to work for.

We offer:
1. Free sample worth of 50 to 100$
2. Paid as soon as you deliver the content
3. You can improve your skills and create  your own portfolio
4. If we're satisfied, you will receive genuine 5 star feedback on Upwork
5. Possible long term collaboration if satisfied
6. Later opportunity to create Reels from the Raw Footages as well (using Google Drive)

Ideal Candidate:
- runner / person involved in running
- person in clothing niche with experience of creating raw footages

If you are interested, send us 3 of your best videos so we can check closely / or send you TikTok / Instagram profile with your videos.

If you're excited to be part of our brand, then we'd love to hear from you!


Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:01 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:UGC, Influencer Marketing, Content Marketing
Skills: UGC, Influencer Marketing, Content Marketing
Country: Slovakia
click to apply

item.title: Chinese Video Creator for High-Converting Product Ads (Based in China) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking talented and experienced video creators based in China to produce engaging and high-quality videos for our products. These videos will be used for advertising purposes across various platforms to drive conversions and boost sales. The ideal candidates should be skilled in both filming and editing, with a proven track record of creating ads that convert into sales.

You receive the products, and then the work starts with filming, then editing...

Responsibilities:

Film and produce high-quality video content showcasing our products.
Edit videos to create engaging, compelling, and professional advertisements.
Develop creative concepts and storyboards tailored to our target audience.
Implement effective video marketing strategies to maximize conversions.
Optimize videos for different platforms (social media, websites, etc.) to ensure the best performance.
Collaborate with our marketing team to align video content with our brand and marketing goals.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating video ads that drive sales and conversions.
Strong skills in filming, video editing, and post-production.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging video concepts.
Knowledge of video marketing best practices and trends.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Must be based in China.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in e-commerce or product-based video production.
Familiarity with advertising on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
Understanding of the Chinese market and consumer behavior.
How to Apply:

If you are a creative and results-driven video creator based in China with a passion for producing high-converting ads, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your portfolio, resume, and a brief description of your relevant experience.



Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Chinese, Graphic Design, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Chinese, Graphic Design, Video Commercial
Country: DNK
click to apply

item.title: Video editing for a mobile app demonstration - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor that is available to deliver a video at relatively short notice - needs to be completed within a 3-4 weeks timeframe.

This is for a demonstration/promotional video that will highlight the key features within our new mobile. The idea is for it to be a combination of Figma-style animations and stock video to create it.

Inspiration for the project has been from this video -https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_dGx0ZVtQnw

Although this is a one off project, if this is successful, there would be opportunity to help us with considerably more product marketing videos in the future.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Demo Video, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Advertisement Creator for Social Media Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video advertisement creator who can produce captivating videos for social media platforms to promote our website and its products. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends and possess the ability to create engaging content that resonates with our target audience. This role requires creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to work within brand guidelines.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong knowledge of social media platforms and their video requirements
    - Ability to storyboard and create compelling narratives
    - Familiarity with video production equipment
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    If you are passionate about video creation and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to showcase your talent and contribute to our company's growth.

    Please provide a portfolio or samples of previous work when applying.

    We are looking for a medium-sized team or an individual freelancer who can work with us on an ongoing basis. The duration of the project is expected to be 3 to 6 months.

    Expertise level: Intermediate


Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Commercial, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: Video Commercial, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Country: IND
click to apply
